Name: HEAT SHIELD
Description: Originally designed to be a high-end hibachi grill, the HS-01T turned out to be a fantastic little heat shield. What you do with it after you land is up to you.

Name: HEAT SHIELD
Description: The team at O.H.B Demolitions were skeptical working on heat shields, but they soon learned that superheating a part to insane temperatures and not having them explode was almost as much fun as blowing them up. Almost.

Name: HEAT SHIELD
Description: The HS-250 combines the latest high-tensile alloys combined with a heaping amount of <top-secret heat absorbing ingredient> to ensure your craft stays cool and safe during re-entry.

Name: INFLATABLE HEAT SHIELD
Description: The HS-I is a unique inflatable heat shield and one of O.N.B. Demolition's best sellers. It is large enough to protect even extra large craft during re-entry and doubles as a bouncy house after landing! What's not to like?

Name: HEAT SHIELD
Description: The HS-375 large heat shield may resemble a children's swimming pool, but we can assure you that a great amount of time and energy went into its design. The R&D team only used it for swimming on weekends.

Name: HEAT SHIELD
Description: The HS-588 is an extra large heat shield that uses an extra amount of high-tensile alloys combined with an extra amount of <top-secret heat absorbing ingredient> to keep you extra safe during extra extremes of re-entry. Did we mention it is extra stylish?
